sections.heading: Definitions.Section 13b-117. - Registration of transportation network company

sections.heading: Registration of transportation network company. Penalty.
sections.text: Registration of transportation network company. Penalty.

sections.heading: Display of information and decal
sections.text: Fares and dynamic pricing. Adoption of nondiscrimination policy. Records and audits. Limitations on hours of operation. Prohibition against using taxicab or motor vehicle in livery service as transportation network company vehicle. Regulations.

sections.heading: Transportation network company driver requirements
sections.text: Adoption of policies re drugs and alcohol and illness and fatigue. Operation as transportation network company driver without authority; penalty. Certification re condition of transportation network company vehicle.

sections.heading: Fee for prearranged ride by transportation network company.
sections.text: Fee for prearranged ride by transportation network company.
